title: Photos of China’s Green Energy Transition
full_text: Photos of China’s Green Energy Transition. These photos by Chu Weimin show the mind-boggling scale of China’s green energy buildout. Last year China insta. These photos by Chu Weimin show the mind-boggling scale of China’s green energy buildout. Last year China installed more than half of all wind and solar added globally.
